CustomField.description: The Reference Program Member checkbox indicates whether or not a Contact and/or Account is a customer reference, which is one factor that determines if a record may be included in Reference Search results. Reference Status must be Active or Caution.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Reference Program Member checkbox indicates whether or not a Contact and/or Account is a customer reference, which is one factor that determines if a record may be included in Reference Search results. Reference Status must be Active or Caution.
CustomField.label: Reference Program Member
